name: Donaldson Company, Inc.
description: Donaldson Company, Inc. is a global leader in the filtration industry, dedicated to providing innovative solutions that improve air and liquid filtration. Founded in 1915 by L.P. Donaldson, the company has a long-standing reputation for excellence in manufacturing and distributing filtration systems and replacement parts for various industries, including aerospace, agriculture, automotive, construction, and food processing. With headquarters in Bloomington, Minnesota, Donaldson operates more than 140 locations worldwide, employing over 14,000 people. The company is committed to sustainability, focusing on developing products that enhance environmental performance and reduce emissions. Donaldson's extensive product portfolio includes air filters, fuel filters, hydraulic filters, and industrial dust collectors, which are vital for maintaining the efficiency and longevity of machinery and vehicles. The company invests significantly in research and development to drive technological advancements in filtration, ensuring its solutions meet the evolving needs of customers. With a strong focus on customer satisfaction and operational excellence, Donaldson continues to lead the way in providing innovative filtration solutions that protect people, equipment, and the environment.
